name: Lucky Of Love
detailed_description:
Lucky Of Love is a puzzle game. You just need to turn the turntable, lose a bomb, win a fortune, and unlock all the pictures quickly.

There are no time or level restrictions in the game. The intention is to let you enjoy a relaxed experience.



Game features



1. Exquisite CG pictures

2. Funny play

3. Real Japanese Girl Voice
about_the_game:

short_description: Relax puzzle games, see pictures and listen to music, happy every day!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Greek, Czech, Polish, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN 7/8/10/XP(64bir required)
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

content_descriptors.notes: The content contained in this game may not be suitable for all ages or may not be accessible during work: nudity or pornography, common adult content
